intents.name: order_status
intents.response: To check your order status, please provide your order ID. You can find it in your order confirmation email. Alternatively, you can check your order status in your account dashboard under 'My Orders'.

intents.name: refund
intents.response: We offer a 30-day return policy. To initiate a refund, please go to 'My Orders' in your account, select the order you want to return, and click 'Request Return'. Our team will process your refund within 5-7 business days after we receive the item.

intents.name: shipping
intents.response: We offer standard shipping (5-7 business days) and express shipping (2-3 business days). Free shipping is available on orders over $50. Shipping costs vary by location and order size. You can see exact shipping costs at checkout.

intents.name: payment
intents.response: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and digital wallets. If you're experiencing payment issues, please check that your card details are correct and that you have sufficient funds. For payment problems, contact our billing support at billing@support.com

intents.name: account
intents.response: You can create an account by clicking 'Sign Up' on our homepage. If you've forgotten your password, click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and we'll send you a reset link. For account issues, visit the 'Account Settings' page.

intents.name: product_inquiry
intents.response: You can find detailed product information, specifications, and features on each product page. If you need more specific details, please let me know which product you're interested in, and I'll help you find the information.

intents.name: complaint
intents.response: I'm sorry to hear about your experience. We take all complaints seriously. Please provide details about your issue, and I'll connect you with our support team. You can also email us at support@company.com with your order number.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for unused items in original packaging. Items must be returned with proof of purchase. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and going to 'My Orders'. Click on your order number to see the tracking information. You'll also receive email updates with tracking links.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping times vary by location (typically 10-20 business days). Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your location.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers for certain regions. All payments are processed securely.

faqs.question: How do I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it if it hasn't been shipped yet. Go to 'My Orders', select the order, and click 'Cancel Order'. For orders that have already shipped, you'll need to return the item after receiving it.

faqs.question: Is my personal information secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. All personal and payment information is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your information with third parties without your consent.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer service?
faqs.answer: You can contact us through this chatbot, email at support@company.com, or call our support line at 1-800-SUPPORT (Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST). We typically respond within 24 hours.

faqs.question: Do you have a mobile app?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our mobile app is available for both iOS and Android. You can download it from the App Store or Google Play Store. The app offers a better shopping experience with exclusive app-only deals.

faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: Our customer support is available Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST. Our online store is open 24/7, and you can place orders anytime. Email support responses are typically sent within 24 hours.

faqs.question: Can I modify my order after placing it?
faqs.answer: You can modify your order within 2 hours of placing it if it hasn't entered the fulfillment process. After that, you may need to cancel and reorder, or contact support for assistance.
